SELECT a.id, a.company_name companyName, a.company_desc companyDesc, a.p_id pId, b.`name` provinceName, c.`name` cityName, d.`name` areaName, e.`name` townshipName, a.address_detailed addressDetailed, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM company_mation f WHERE a.id = f.p_id) childsNum, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_eve_user_staff g WHERE g.company_id = a.id) userNum, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM company_department h WHERE a.id = h.company_id) departmentNum, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime FROM company_mation a LEFT JOIN t_area b ON a.address_province = b.id LEFT JOIN t_area c ON a.address_city = c.id LEFT JOIN t_area d ON a.address_area = d.id LEFT JOIN t_area e ON a.address_township = e.id WHERE 1=1
AND a.company_name LIKE '%${companyName}%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT a.id, a.company_name companyName FROM company_mation a WHERE a.company_name = #{companyName}
